sentences.sentence: Of course, outer freedom is the premiss and basis for inner freedom.
sentences.translation: 当然，外在自由是内在自由的前提和基础。

sentences.sentence: So, on the premiss of good intensity, ADI advances the toughness and plasticity of the materials.
sentences.translation: 因此，ADI可在获得较高强度的前提下，使材料的韧塑性得到大大提高。

sentences.sentence: In the hot spots of robot research field, robot off-line programming is the key of utility of robot technology, and robot vision calibration is the premiss of off-line programming.
sentences.translation: 在机器人技术的各研究热点中，机器人离线编程技术是机器人技术实用化的关键，而机器人视觉标定又是离线编程的前提。
